sub_title: Senior Scientist, Plasma Physics and Engineering
summary: Plasma scientist and technology developer for nanotech, X-ray applications & semiconductor fabrication. Research interests: RF discharges, extreme UV and X-ray pulses, vacuum breakdown, plasma opening switches, megavolt electron & ion beams, reactive ion etching, plasma diagnostics, liquid metal systems.

profile_positions.description:
Developing advanced UV light sources for 13.5 nm nanolithography using high power pulsed repetitive gas discharge.

As a technical project leader responsible for development of the high power EUV source and multi-kW liquid metal cooling technology.
profile_positions.title: Senior Development Engineer

profile_positions.description: Development of advanced large area plasma sources for a thin film photovoltaic technology. Plasma processes consulting, R&D strategy development.
profile_positions.title: Principal Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Applying plasma technologies for ULSI fabrication processes, developing advanced plasma equipment. 

- VHF low pressure system for metal etch with controlled phase shift and pulsed plasma;
Atomic beam system for precise etching 
- low pressure plasma source based on the ICP discharge with ion beam extraction andd neutralization systems;
Large area plasma ion implantation 
- low pressure capacitively coupled plasma system
New techniques for advanced process characterization
profile_positions.title: Principal Engineer

profile_positions.description: Developing new schemes of power pulses conditioning at megavolt and megaampere levels using plasma opening switches, conducting research, writing papers, supervising graduate students
profile_positions.title: Leading Scientist

profile_positions.description: Developing a new atmospheric pressure discharge system for etching, cleaning and enhancing absorption properties of the glass surface.
profile_positions.title: Visiting Researcher

profile_positions.description: Created repetitive X-ray and electron beam generators for radiation tests and sterilization. Developed diagnostic tools to describe plasma switch performance. Discovered a row of  phenomena responsible for “switching effect” in plasma filled diodes (mass and energy analysis of ion fluxes using time and space-resolved ion spectroscopy) Designed a new ion analyzer.
profile_positions.title: Senior Scientist, Scientist and Engineer
